üí¨ 1/05/2018 Correspondence - Sam @ delosilabs.com

General Usage Guideline: 5 - 7% (account for variances for flavor profiles)

Mints Menthol Tobaccos: 3 - 5%

Natural Occurring Citrus: Fruit Punch, Lemons, Limes, Grapefruit, Oranges etc: 1-3%

Aroma Stick: Moderately Strong; Natural Ripe Strawberry mixed with a soft Dairy Cream. Akin to a Strawberry & Cream Smoothie

\_ \_ \_ \_ \_
